metadata.title: The Dijker
metadata.description: The Dijker is a new type of vehicle that feels quite familiar at the same time.

landing.title: Welcome to the Dijker
landing.section1: As if it has always existed: the dijker. A new type of vehicle that feels quite familiar at the same time. It breathes nostalgia.
landing.section2: But don't let the classic lines fool you, the dijker is a high-tech vehicle with its unique spiral belt drive multispeedÂ®.
